title: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
description: Ensure access to basic resources, social protection, and economic opportunities for all.

subpoints.C: Help children understand that everyone should have food, clothes, and a safe home.
subpoints.Y: Focus on providing education and training so young people can earn and live well.
subpoints.M: Implement workplace and community programs to reduce poverty through investments and social policies.
subpoints.G: Policies should guarantee social safety nets, financial inclusion, and economic equality at national and local levels.

subpoints.C: Teach kids that sharing and helping others is important.
subpoints.Y: Encourage young adults to volunteer and support local initiatives.
subpoints.M: Develop corporate social responsibility programs targeting underserved communities.
subpoints.G: Strengthen government and NGO partnerships to reach vulnerable populations.

subpoints.C: Explain why having food and school is important for a happy life.
subpoints.Y: Support young people in accessing affordable housing and healthcare.
subpoints.M: Provide microfinance and job creation programs for local entrepreneurs.
subpoints.G: Monitor poverty trends and implement long-term inclusive development strategies.

title: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
description: Ensure everyone has enough safe and nutritious food and promote sustainable farming.

subpoints.C: Teach children why eating healthy foods is important for growing strong.
subpoints.Y: Encourage young people to support local farmers and reduce food waste.
subpoints.M: Adopt sustainable agriculture methods and supply chains for better nutrition.
subpoints.G: Support policies promoting food security, nutrition programs, and sustainable agriculture incentives.

subpoints.C: Show kids fun ways to plant small gardens at school or home.
subpoints.Y: Provide access to learning about balanced diets and eco-friendly farming.
subpoints.M: Invest in technology for precision agriculture to improve yields.
subpoints.G: Fund initiatives that reduce hunger and promote food access for vulnerable communities.

subpoints.C: Explain how farmers grow vegetables and fruits.
subpoints.Y: Engage youth in community-supported agriculture and nutrition campaigns.
subpoints.M: Support agricultural innovation and partnerships with local producers.
subpoints.G: Create national strategies to improve crop yields and sustainable food production.

title: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
description: Improve healthcare access, disease prevention, and mental well-being.

subpoints.C: Teach children about washing hands, eating healthy foods, and visiting doctors when sick.
subpoints.Y: Encourage young adults to exercise regularly, eat balanced meals, and care for their mental health.
subpoints.M: Implement workplace wellness programs and stress management support for employees.
subpoints.G: Establish national healthcare systems, vaccination programs, and public health policies for disease prevention.

subpoints.C: Explain why vaccines and checkups help keep people safe and healthy.
subpoints.Y: Promote health awareness campaigns on lifestyle diseases and mental well-being for youth.
subpoints.M: Encourage health screenings, ergonomic practices, and preventive care in offices.
subpoints.G: Invest in healthcare infrastructure, emergency services, and disease monitoring programs.

subpoints.C: Teach kids to recognize when they feel unwell and ask for help.
subpoints.Y: Support youth in understanding mental health, hygiene, and nutrition.
subpoints.M: Offer counseling and mental health workshops for managers and employees.
subpoints.G: Implement nationwide public health education and programs to reduce disease burden.

title: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
description: Provide equal access to education, skills, and lifelong learning opportunities.

subpoints.C: Make learning fun and easy for all children in school through games, stories, and interactive lessons.
subpoints.Y: Encourage young adults to pursue skill development, online courses, and vocational training.
subpoints.M: Support continuing education and professional development opportunities for employees.
subpoints.G: Implement policies to guarantee free and inclusive education for all genders and communities.

subpoints.C: Explain the importance of reading books, asking questions, and exploring new ideas.
subpoints.Y: Promote online learning, certifications, and workshops for youth skill enhancement.
subpoints.M: Develop mentorship programs, seminars, and workshops to enhance workforce knowledge.
subpoints.G: Invest in educational infrastructure, teacher training, and digital literacy programs nationwide.

subpoints.C: Teach kids to be curious, explore nature, and participate in creative activities.
subpoints.Y: Encourage lifelong learning and self-improvement opportunities for young adults.
subpoints.M: Support employees in attending conferences, seminars, and training for career growth.
subpoints.G: Ensure equitable access to quality education and learning opportunities for all populations.

title: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
description: Eliminate discrimination, ensure equal rights, and provide opportunities for women and girls.

subpoints.C: Teach children that boys and girls are equal and should share responsibilities.
subpoints.Y: Encourage young women and men to pursue education and leadership roles equally.
subpoints.M: Implement workplace policies to ensure gender equality, equal pay, and safe work environments.
subpoints.G: Promote legal frameworks and programs supporting women’s rights and empowerment.

subpoints.C: Explain why it’s important to treat everyone with respect.
subpoints.Y: Raise awareness among youth about combating gender stereotypes and discrimination.
subpoints.M: Support mentorship, leadership training, and career development for female employees.
subpoints.G: Fund initiatives to reduce gender-based violence and improve social protection for women and girls.

subpoints.C: Teach kids to play and learn without thinking boys are better than girls.
subpoints.Y: Encourage young adults to challenge unfair norms and advocate for equality.
subpoints.M: Promote organizational culture that values diversity and inclusion at all levels.
subpoints.G: Strengthen national policies and programs that empower women socially, economically, and politically.

title: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
description: Provide clean water, safe sanitation, and promote sustainable usage practices.

subpoints.C: Teach kids to wash hands and brush teeth with clean water daily.
subpoints.Y: Promote awareness about water conservation and hygiene among young people.
subpoints.M: Encourage offices to use water-saving technologies and provide proper sanitation facilities.
subpoints.G: Invest in infrastructure for clean water supply, sanitation, and wastewater treatment nationwide.

subpoints.C: Explain why drinking clean water keeps everyone healthy.
subpoints.Y: Educate youth about safe sanitation practices and reducing pollution.
subpoints.M: Implement regular maintenance of workplace sanitation and water facilities.
subpoints.G: Develop policies ensuring equitable access to safe water and sanitation for all communities.

subpoints.C: Teach children to avoid littering and keep water clean.
subpoints.Y: Encourage young adults to participate in water conservation campaigns.
subpoints.M: Monitor water usage and promote sustainability programs in organizations.
subpoints.G: Strengthen water resource management, pollution control, and ecosystem protection measures.

title: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable, and modern energy for all
description: Expand energy access, improve efficiency, and promote renewable sources.

subpoints.C: Teach children to switch off lights and save energy.
subpoints.Y: Encourage youth to explore renewable energy technologies like solar and wind.
subpoints.M: Adopt energy-efficient technologies and renewable energy solutions in workplaces.
subpoints.G: Invest in renewable energy projects and policies to ensure affordable access for all.

subpoints.C: Explain how solar and wind energy are clean and safe.
subpoints.Y: Raise awareness about reducing fossil fuel use and promoting green energy.
subpoints.M: Support companies in transitioning to renewable and clean energy options.
subpoints.G: Develop laws and frameworks to encourage sustainable energy adoption nationwide.

subpoints.C: Teach kids why using clean energy helps the planet stay healthy.
subpoints.Y: Encourage youth to participate in campaigns for clean and sustainable energy.
subpoints.M: Introduce policies for energy audits and energy efficiency improvements.
subpoints.G: Ensure universal energy access while promoting sustainability goals.

title: Promote sustained, inclusive, and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment, and decent work for all
description: Foster economic growth, job opportunities, and decent working conditions.

subpoints.C: Teach kids why work helps people earn money to buy what they need.
subpoints.Y: Encourage young adults to explore entrepreneurship and creative industries.
subpoints.M: Promote fair wages, safe working conditions, and opportunities for all employees.
subpoints.G: Support national policies that stimulate economic growth and job creation.

subpoints.C: Explain that teamwork makes jobs easier and more fun.
subpoints.Y: Support training and internships for youth to gain work experience.
subpoints.M: Provide continuous learning and development opportunities for staff.
subpoints.G: Encourage innovation and investment in sustainable industries to boost growth.

subpoints.C: Show how chores and small tasks prepare kids for bigger jobs in the future.
subpoints.Y: Promote financial literacy and responsible economic behavior among youth.
subpoints.M: Encourage entrepreneurship, innovation, and inclusive business practices.
subpoints.G: Strengthen institutions to promote productive employment and fair work opportunities.

title: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization, and foster innovation
description: Support infrastructure growth, innovation, and sustainable industries.

subpoints.C: Teach kids how roads, schools, and hospitals make life easier.
subpoints.Y: Encourage youth to pursue careers in science, engineering, and technology.
subpoints.M: Support sustainable industrial practices and innovative business models.
subpoints.G: Invest in resilient infrastructure and inclusive industrial development.

subpoints.C: Explain how building bridges, houses, and factories helps communities grow.
subpoints.Y: Promote youth involvement in innovation and entrepreneurship.
subpoints.M: Adopt modern technologies and sustainable infrastructure investments.
subpoints.G: Create policies encouraging research, development, and sustainable industries.

subpoints.Y: Promote energy-efficient practices in youth-led projects and learning labs.
subpoints.M: Implement energy-efficient technologies and eco-friendly practices in industrial processes.
subpoints.G: Support regulations and incentives for sustainable industrial practices and reduced carbon emissions.

title: Reduce inequality within and among countries
description: Promote fairness and equality across individuals and nations.

subpoints.C: Teach kids that everyone should be treated kindly and fairly.
subpoints.Y: Encourage young people to speak out against discrimination and unfairness.
subpoints.M: Adopt workplace policies that promote diversity and inclusion.
subpoints.G: Implement laws and international cooperation to reduce inequality.

subpoints.C: Show that sharing and helping others makes life better for everyone.
subpoints.Y: Promote equal opportunities for youth in education and jobs.
subpoints.M: Support programs for disadvantaged groups and minority communities.
subpoints.G: Strengthen systems that ensure equitable growth and fair resource distribution.

subpoints.C: Explain that no matter where someone comes from, they deserve respect.
subpoints.Y: Raise awareness about global inequality and its impact on development.
subpoints.M: Encourage fair pay, equal treatment, and opportunities at work.
subpoints.G: Create global policies to support equity among developing and developed nations.

title: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient, and sustainable
description: Improve living conditions, urban planning, and community resilience.

subpoints.C: Teach kids why clean parks, safe roads, and good houses matter.
subpoints.Y: Encourage youth to participate in community service and city improvement projects.
subpoints.M: Promote green buildings, public transport, and waste management systems.
subpoints.G: Plan urban development policies that prioritize safety and sustainability.

subpoints.C: Explain how safe schools and hospitals make cities better.
subpoints.Y: Promote affordable housing and safe spaces for young people.
subpoints.M: Design workplaces and commercial areas that are safe, accessible, and environmentally friendly.
subpoints.G: Plan and implement urban policies that ensure safe, inclusive, and sustainable living spaces.

subpoints.C: Explain that good transportation like buses and bikes helps people go to school safely.
subpoints.Y: Promote sustainable mobility and awareness campaigns for youth.
subpoints.M: Invest in transport infrastructure that reduces emissions and improves efficiency.
subpoints.G: Develop national transport policies promoting accessibility, sustainability, and safety for all.

title: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

subpoints.C: Teach children that using only what we need and recycling helps the Earth.
subpoints.Y: Encourage youth to adopt sustainable habits and reduce waste in daily life.
subpoints.M: Promote sustainable supply chains and responsible production practices in businesses.
subpoints.G: Implement regulations that ensure responsible consumption and production nationally and globally.

subpoints.C: Explain that taking care of water, food, and other resources keeps everyone happy and healthy.
subpoints.Y: Raise awareness among youth about resource management and environmental responsibility.
subpoints.M: Optimize resource use in industrial production and reduce environmental impact.
subpoints.G: Develop policies that promote sustainable resource management and circular economy approaches.

subpoints.C: Teach children not to waste food and why it’s important to share and save resources.
subpoints.Y: Encourage youth to join programs that reduce food waste and promote responsible consumption.
subpoints.M: Implement strategies in businesses to minimize food loss and optimize supply chains.
subpoints.G: Governments and organizations should create policies to monitor and reduce food waste in production and distribution.

title: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
description: Address global warming through awareness, resilience, and clean energy.

subpoints.C: Teach kids why planting trees and saving energy helps fight climate change.
subpoints.Y: Encourage youth to join climate action groups and eco-projects.
subpoints.M: Adopt clean energy practices and reduce carbon footprints at workplaces.
subpoints.G: Strengthen national policies to meet climate commitments.

subpoints.C: Explain why turning off lights saves the Earth.
subpoints.Y: Promote renewable energy use in schools and communities.
subpoints.M: Integrate climate risks into business and investment strategies.
subpoints.G: Develop climate-resilient policies and invest in adaptation efforts.

subpoints.C: Show kids why caring for nature makes the world cooler and safer.
subpoints.Y: Raise awareness about global warming and its effects on daily life.
subpoints.M: Support innovation in green technologies.
subpoints.G: Provide global support for countries vulnerable to climate change.

title: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas, and marine resources
description: Protect marine life, reduce pollution, and promote sustainable fishing.

subpoints.C: Teach kids not to throw plastic in water because it harms fish.
subpoints.Y: Encourage youth to join beach clean-ups and marine protection drives.
subpoints.M: Adopt sustainable fishing and reduce industrial marine pollution.
subpoints.G: Create stronger policies against plastic waste and overfishing.

subpoints.C: Explain how clean oceans help people and animals stay healthy.
subpoints.Y: Promote careers and studies in marine conservation.
subpoints.M: Support eco-friendly shipping and port operations.
subpoints.G: Protect marine ecosystems and expand ocean conservation zones.

subpoints.C: Show kids how coral reefs are like homes for sea creatures.
subpoints.Y: Encourage youth research projects on marine biodiversity.
subpoints.M: Invest in marine renewable energy and ocean-based solutions.
subpoints.G: Cooperate internationally on ocean health and governance.

title: Protect, restore, and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems
description: Safeguard forests, land, and biodiversity from degradation.

subpoints.C: Teach kids why trees and forests are the lungs of the Earth.
subpoints.Y: Encourage youth to participate in tree planting campaigns.
subpoints.M: Adopt land-friendly farming and reduce deforestation practices.
subpoints.G: Strengthen forest conservation laws and global land protection.

subpoints.C: Show kids why animals need safe homes in forests.
subpoints.Y: Promote wildlife clubs and biodiversity awareness among youth.
subpoints.M: Support conservation programs and eco-tourism.
subpoints.G: Implement policies to stop desertification and biodiversity loss.

subpoints.C: Explain that taking care of the land keeps our planet alive.
subpoints.Y: Encourage youth projects on soil care and reforestation.
subpoints.M: Promote sustainable agriculture and water management.
subpoints.G: Develop international programs to restore degraded lands.

title: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development
description: Build justice, equality, and strong institutions for lasting peace.

subpoints.C: Teach children to be kind, share, and solve problems without fighting.
subpoints.Y: Encourage youth to join peace clubs and mediation groups.
subpoints.M: Implement workplace fairness, non-discrimination, and transparency policies.
subpoints.G: Develop strong institutions that protect human rights and reduce violence.

subpoints.C: Explain why bullying and hurting others is wrong.
subpoints.Y: Engage youth in anti-violence campaigns and peer support networks.
subpoints.M: Adopt corporate safeguards against harassment and abuse.
subpoints.G: Enforce national and international laws against violence and exploitation.

subpoints.C: Teach kids why fairness and rules matter in school and play.
subpoints.Y: Raise awareness about justice, rights, and responsibilities among youth.
subpoints.M: Promote transparent governance in organizations.
subpoints.G: Ensure access to justice for all and build accountable institutions.

title: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
description: Boost international collaboration, finance, trade, and innovation for global goals.

subpoints.C: Explain that working together helps everyone have what they need.
subpoints.Y: Encourage youth to collaborate in community projects and share resources.
subpoints.M: Foster partnerships between businesses to support sustainable development goals.
subpoints.G: Governments should strengthen international cooperation and financial support.

subpoints.C: Teach children that sharing knowledge and helping friends is good.
subpoints.Y: Promote youth networks and collaborations to solve community challenges.
subpoints.M: Engage in cross-industry collaborations and knowledge sharing.
subpoints.G: Enhance trade, technology transfer, and partnerships to achieve sustainable development.

subpoints.C: Explain that giving and receiving help can make projects succeed.
subpoints.Y: Encourage young people to participate in joint programs and mentorship.
subpoints.M: Support joint ventures and projects with social and environmental benefits.
subpoints.G: Strengthen multi-stakeholder partnerships to mobilize resources and expertise.
